vulnerabilities.description_of_vuln: The application allows user input to be reflected in the page without proper sanitization, enabling XSS attacks

semantic_details.description: The application has a reflected XSS vulnerability in the /xss31 endpoint where user input from the 'name' parameter is inserted into the page without proper sanitization. The application attempts to restrict certain HTML tags with a regex pattern, but it can be bypassed.
impact: Execution of arbitrary JavaScript in victim's browser
scenario: Attacker crafts a malicious URL with JavaScript payload in the 'name' parameter
The application reflects the payload in the response
JavaScript executes in the victim's browser context
